Hi, I'm Dave.

This is my blog, it exists because I wanted to play with static site generators. It is currently built with cobalt.rs.

It lives on a Raspberry Pi 1b in my spare room.

All content is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International License, and the source can be found here.

It's mainly going to be stuff about cycling, computers and cats. So, if none of those things float your boat, close the tab now.
